cause.description:
By changing the weather patterns around the southern end and south western end of Australia, we will be able to induce better weather patterns to increase surf conditions for the victorian coastline. Weather Inducing For Better Surf is a non-profit organisition, all the money raised will go the better research to help induce better weather patterns that will be more stable throught the year, instead of seasonal variations.
1. Clouds will part
2. Northerly winds will blow
3. Large ground swell will be produced
4. Amazing surf should be enjoyed by all
cause.name: WIFBS
